dataList.dlg:
Aah... Could it... You're...
My Sinclair...?

All my fault, you say...? What fault?
I daresay it's all thanks to me.

dataList.desc: 말풍선 특수 대사_에드가 가문 치프 버틀러 료슈
dataList.dlg:
S.A.D.
You're a failure of a Chief Butler.

... I'll gouge out your
contemptuous eyes.

Do you still fail to understand?
That you... are nothing but prey!

A soaking wet mutt, are you now?
Oh, does this not remind you of
the day I took your place?! HAHAHAHA!

Hmph, how dare you glorified
dishwashers bare your knives at me?

Catherine...?! It's me, Heathcliff...!
Please, embrace me once again!!!

It matters not what kind of Heathcliff you are!
I shall embrace every Catherine mine!!!

... You gave up your dream for the Family? 
You, who preached about your
dream with every breath...?
No... she is not like my sister.

You dare raise your blade against a higher Kindred? 
Punishment for your filial impiety awaits. 
... And for me as well, I suppose...

Those wounds... the Priest of this world
must be just as haunted by guilt.

I expect you to fight to your deaths in this
crucial struggle, reversible as they may be.
It must lie there still, shrouded it may be.
The mass of pain within your heart... is difficult to untangle.

Is it your companions who hold your tongue?
Then... perhaps they must be shaken afore
you are to speak your truth.
Do not fear the futility. There will be time for that once you have spoken your mind.
Rest awhile... until the clock turns.

Huh... y'all ain't half bad!
Keep makin' it worth my bullet fees!

dataList.desc: 뇌횡사용 시: 탄환 충분 - 강력한 스킬
dataList.dlg:
Eyes up here, boys!
Don'tcha go losin' yer heads now!

dataList.desc: 뇌횡사용 시: 탄환 부족 - 강력한 스킬
dataList.dlg: Hwell, what's this? Manageable so far?

I'maboutta drop somethin' big on y'all!
Don't let it kill y'all now and spoil the fun!

Aw heck, don't tell me
y'all are tuckered out already!

dataList.desc: 뇌횡턴 시작 : [체력 n% 이하]에 버프 획득
dataList.dlg:
That's more like it.
Y'all are firin' me up!

Y'all don't go on huntin' tigers without preparin'
yerselves to get chomped 'tween one of them jaws!

dataList.desc: 뇌횡턴 시작 : [체력 n% 이하]에 버프 변경
dataList.dlg:
Can't leave a dance unfinished.
Ain't that right?

Can't waste any more time on these...
... sickening, revolting insects.

Don’t pretend you’ve changed.
You’re still the same trash you were back then... scum!
... Is this also the E.G.O's power?

Behold! This contempt!
It rains down upon the disgusting filth!

You have taken a glimpse of yesterday's spring.
A memory rarely availed to even myself.

Do not let your past ties ruin your judgment.
It makes me want to blast them all away.

Sacrifices are necessary
in pursuit of the greater cause.

dataList.desc: 구보체력 n% 미만 / 경멸 나선 모드 감상

dataList.dlg:
Oh, revered Xianren! Shi Miyin brought the gem back!
The pretty gem that'll make Hongyuan all beautiful again…!

Blasphemous transgressors!
Outsiders shall not covet the treasure of Daguanyuan!

You favor me, don't you?
I knew you would, dear Xianhuang Worm!

All the wisdom of Hongyuan...
Give it to me, give it to Miyin...!
Be one with the fathomless history of Hongyuan!

dataList.desc: 가모턴 시작 : 지고한 불사 흐트러짐 실패
dataList.dlg:
We have transcended the yoke of life and death...
Thus, Hongyuan shall shine for all eternity as well!
Ahh... What a shameful failure of duties this is...
In the name of Love and Justice~ Here comes Magical Girl!

dataList.desc: 절망의 기사 첫 흐트러짐 이후 검 소환 패턴에 진입했을 때
dataList.dlg: So you’ve been consumed too, senpai… Can this cycle really not be stopped?
Heed me, thou that are more azure than justice and more crimson than love…
In the name of those buried in destiny, I shall make this oath to the light.
You've... been suppressing it as much as you could...

dataList.desc: 완전 제압 X, 아르카나 슬레이브 발사 후
dataList.dlg: Huff, puff, puff... Did... did we get her?!
I swore I would... protect everyone... to the end…
"Couldn't you have dodged that, you oaf?!"
You were going to kill that time anyway.

We can't rip their time...?
"You bloody fool!"
"We've been had!"

We reap the dying hours.
"You've plenty o' time! Give it!"
"Let's sever 500... no, 2000 hours."
"Get a grip, you muppet!"

"Damn... let's end this."
"You're taking too much time from us...!"
The benefits will outweigh the costs. Calm down.

We have no choice but to use it.
"Make sure your arithmetics are correct. Equal hours from everyone!"
Shut— Shut up! We're infighting...! This is a waste of time!
I don't recall this candidate... Hm, all kinds of sorry churls seem to vie for the seat of the Hierarch in this place they call a mirror world.
This is no place for something so insignificant as family. You, who are causeless and hollow of vision toward Hongyuan, do not belong here.
Benighted is this fool. One need not coerce others to lay down their lives, for the pursuit of a great cause naturally begets those who would gladly brave death itself.
For all that disinclination toward violence, you seem to have a passing talent for it nonetheless. Even a pathetic craven becomes... a madman when swept up by the flow.
Behold the fool, the jester; he hollers empty skyward boasts, yet heaven remains just as unreachable.
Ha... ha ha! I shall always welcome another opportunity to cut down these ancient demons who have been seduced by immortality!
Keep twisting in that filth, Shi Miyin... It'll only enhance the taste of happiness, wrath, sorrow, and joy when I cleave into you!
I never thought I'd ever see you in Hongyuan again, big brother... Fuhu, so in this world, you managed to survive. You seem to be carving out your own path much like myself.

Phew... okay, fine. Then...
As the Lord of Hongyuan, I hereby grant you audience.

Avenging Jia Huan shouldn't affect you this much now, should it...? When did this revolting display of belated melodrama replace your advocacy for the cold and calculating pragmatism you had discussed before me?

dataList.desc: 말풍선 특수 대사_홍원 군주 홍루_가모 보옥탈출
dataList.dlg: Never did I let this sickening cradle imprison me, and that will not change today! Never!
Fascinating. Why was I not told that such interesting dialogues could be had with him in this world?

You assert that education of humanity and propriety is what cleanses the years of fell deeds? The first step seems to have eluded you: absolutely pulverize the fell deeds. Only then shall humanity and propriety have any significance.

Evil must be mercilessly wrested from their roots(除惡務盡 斬草除根). The path I have chosen as the Lord of Hongyuan is a path unburdened by the need to seek understanding from others. Thus, big brother—no, Jia Qiu, this dialogue has met an impasse.

dataList.desc: #################################### LIMBUS COMPANY SPEECH BUBBLE FAN TRANSLATION & ALREADY TRANSLATED LINES FROM HERE!!!!!!!! #########################################################

dataList.dlg:
Pip, your time has come...
Your moment to rise to greatness!

First mate Starbuck...
Freedom is just around the corner!

Queequeg, my best harpooner...
Sever that knot! Before my eyes!
May everyone writhe in the depths of suffering.
We don't even deserve to breathe.
Ah, how long has it been~ since we've all gathered like this?

Hah... I couldn't make a good patchwork out of this.
So I'll just dispose of it!
Oh, you've become a rag? How useless!

All the necessary materials have been gathered?
Now, it's time to cut!!
Huhu~ This is how it should be!
Haha! This is the best! Tearing and stitching~!
This amount of blood is not enough...
This amount of blood is not enough...
The parade... Where would it ever end?
Don't come closer... For beautiful thorns will bloom abundantly.

Crimson thorns will bloom so profusely...
That they cannot be controlled.

Who said you could rest? Get up, now.
We have to keep marching.
It is a pain... that must be endured!
Ah... How can it be so abundant?
After burying all my family... I also will... soon follow them.
Ah... At last... from this thirst...!
That's just attachment, my dream has already ended.

dataList.desc: ############ Knight of the White Moon Bari - i wonder if it works... ############
############ The Wheel of La Manchaland Don Quixote ############
dataList.dlg: Try to defend against this again.
Do you think... you can defend against this again?
Do you think... you can defend against it all?
Yes... this is how it felt.
Now... It seems like it's enough.

I've endured so much... But in the end...
I too am stained by providence.

I... We... haven't changed at all.
The thirst that I can't escape from, that's what it has shown me.
Should I quench my thirst...? I wonder!
Stay still... and remain frozen in place.
It's been a while, I'll quench my thirst.
It's been a long time since the last feast.
Blood is something that can't be defied.
Sancho... How can you reach a dream... that's already ended?

Even if one barely escapes a false adventure...
Can they forget the pain of falling from a horse?

In the end, that dream will only go in circles
and come to an end. Now, wake up!
No, no, no! The dreams of the neighbors!!!
'Facing Battle, To Slay The Enemy...' There are variations.
Haah... 'Blade Dance Under the Blue Moon.'
Your neck, at least... will be cut easily.

dataList.desc: ############ Kkomi and Vergilius? - I'll do the AF sinners if they add them back ############
dataList.dlg: So you're the one who hid it... Huh? It's a line from a TV show.
Kkomi doesn't forgive passengers who don't give candy.
If I find candy. in your pockets. its one punch. per candy.
Kkomi. Strong. If you don't give candy. Angry.
I'm bored now. Mephi. Open doors.
Have you found what you seek?
Such is the fate of a frequent target.
The mirror of this bump has shattered.
How about you examine that one?
I shall carve the sin unto you.
Things are rather busying at the moment.
I'm always ready to speed forward!
Now seems to be our chance!
I was preparing a surprise attack- you were able to detect me?
You shan't be let a moment of clarity!
You're not picking a fight, are you?
Just don't get in the way.
I shall execute the order according to the rules.
I am awaiting your next order.
It seems to have gone well.
You certainly are a peculiar individual.
I won't have to collect these remains.
I’ll do what I can~ If it flunks, it flunks~
I never run out of new sights to see~
It won't be as fun, but I'll do it~
I think I could do a better job next time?
What a joy it is to slash~
Do you need my help, Dante?
I hope luck is at my side~
Haha, how do ya like that?
Alright, who do you want me to scrap?
How's that? Hurts to death, don't it?
Got some sort of bombastic plan?
Go on and get wild for me!
Huff, that feels good to chew.
I'm busy at the moment, so please keep it brief.
Sounds like a plan. Let's go.
I'm in my right mind... for now.
Huff... The noise is reduced a little.
You aren't supposed to visit me in the middle of a mission...
Score! You owe me a treat, Dante~
My, I don't like to be bothered while I'm working~
I like some substance in my victims~
I'll be able to cut them down next, right?
I'll try my best to keep the others safe!
Do you have any business with me, Executive Manager?
I'd appreciate it if you kept it simple.
I should be able to slay them with ease.
What’s up? You got something to say?
Whoa, that was a pretty clean hit.
The hammer… shall pursue you to the end…
The hammer… shall pursue you to the end…
You will repent with your death.

dataList.desc: 1hmm idk what to do if it gets censored

dataList.dlg: Is there anything you want to say?
Well, I... really could use... a warm cup... of tea.
Do you have an opinion you want to voice?
As I feared... I’m not fit for the field...
Gotta make sure to drain all the blood.
I never thought... I'd be an ingredient...
Yeesh, ya startled me! I almost swung at you.
A cut goes here~ A chop goes there~
Hahahahah! Ah, you were by the side!
I presume you have a request.
The assignment is steadily approaching completion.
One has been taken care of.
Ah... Allow me to rest for a moment...
Mm? Bit busy right now, make it quick!
If I knew this would happen... I woulda gone for a bigger spree... the other day.
I'll beat you to a pulp.
Not yet... I've still got things to do...
Is it time to rev up?
Sharpening the sawblade yesterday paid off.
Should've... given my arm... a self-destruct upgrade...
They will not be tormenting anyone any longer.
When... the time comes... I would have to wilt...
Not in the mood, please make it short.
A toast! ...I mean, a clean hit, right?
Bah... You had to keep being sticky... to the bitter end...
I'm busy right now~ But I'll make time to hear what you say.
That'll be hard to recover from.
Melted into a puddle, have you?
Oh my... Have I... overdosed... on the ampule...?
Ah... So it stops... in the end...
Keep your distance. You'll get yourself hurt.
I'll end this in a moment.
Agh... I could... really use... a bowl of beef... noodles.
Hmph, you've got ash on me.
Ah... must I repeat the selection process...?
Phew~ Did they get knocked out cold?
'Tis ill-advised to speak to me whilst I fight a duel.
I'll harpoon and crack you open.
Ah... Haa... Is this... the end?
Phew, took care of that one.
Do other territories require my attention?
Worry... not. My colleagues will... protect...
Oof, did it hurt that much?
Haah... Sorry about that... Client fella...
Get out of my way. I'm... in the zone.
Hah, this is also... quite avant—garde...
Oh dear~ You're not supposed to come in while we're cleaning up.
Stay calm and stay down, now~
Okay, let's get their limbs and torsos over here~
Ah... It was... supposed to be a simple cleanup...?
There is no more information to be gained.
Haah... But... I don't have anyone... to cover my next shift...
Huh? What. It's not him? No way.
Right, so that one's taken care of.
Ah... That's... odd. That deviates... from the patterns.
Ah~ Did I hit ya too hard?
Phew! Hmph, you could’ve tried dodging that.
Suppose... I went in too deep... without a good backup... That was foolish... of me.
The situation has hitherto been quite... ideal.
Let the truths be self—evident to them.
I should've studied... like my seniors always told me to...
Do you require more Work to be done?
Ah, I wasn't supposed to hang them up like that?
Let's get this over with, okay?
Oh... they were... predicting my moves...
Am I freed at last... from the yoke?
Oh, am I getting a signal? Acknowledge.
I'll beat you up and blast you to bits.
You're staggered... Next, I'll blast your guts to smithereens.
Akh... Tsk, didn't think... I'd follow them so soon...
I'm busy. Go bother one of my underlings.
I'll poke you a new breathing hole.
Flapping like a torn sail, huh?
I-I can't die like this... The M-Middle will...
Ah! Hath the Big Brother summoned me?
Steel thyself! The Book demands that thy death be carried out in clear mind.
To end here… is… No. The Middle… will remember…
You should have prepared for retribution when you slighted a member of our family.
I won't… Be the last… of us… The Middle… Remembers…
Hm! They appear to be quite spent.
Tsk. There is no oil to be gleaned from this fellow.
Ha ha ha... Thus does my... voyage... end...
Want me to tie knot again? Desperate's Knot?
Miss the sunset... the shimmering... sky...
I've hit all of your vital areas.
Huh? No... I thought... the duel was... going well...
... I'm a bit preoccupied at the moment.
... I'm a bit preoccupied at the moment.
Is there aught else to suppress?!
I shall chew thee to shreds!
Just thee wait! Thou shall be devoured whole posthaste!
So I have always… shone so brightly…
So I have always… shone so brightly…
I have them in my sights. State your business, quickly.
Worry not. There won't be any pain.
Is there aught you would like to ask?
Pain paves the road to understanding!
The path to enlightenment is an excruciating one.
I must have forgotten… the knowledge that would have been my salvation from death…
To bring the umbra of ignorance to light.
… Shall be unveiled unto the light.
Um… I guess knowledge about food recipes… weren't too useful…
Focus on the Whale if you have the time to flap your gums!
Our foes cower! This is our opportunity to turn the tide!
Good! Do not stop until we have slaughtered every last one of them! We shall seek no respite until it is done!
Hngh…! Hold your stations! The foe has its eyes on me—use this opportunity to strike them!

I-I am Captain Ishmael!
I will not fall… here…!

You see?! The enemy has been crushed like this...
Victory is right before our eyes!
So... the red plum blossom... blooms from me all the same...
I am quite busy at the moment!
Hm? Aha, I must not have struck true...
Aah, haah... Forsooth, well did I expect to be... hewn... myself.
I will not accept any unsolicited advice.
If you will cut... then wager your life on it.
A defeat of my own making...
Ah... how will I stand tall before my... fellows...?
I told you, I don't talk and fight! ... So what is it?
Is my last thought... really gonna be... about... that drink I left back home...?
Get up. A wooden dummy stands taller than you do.
Haah… These… moving dummies must've been… insufficient training material.
Whew, watch out for the heat! I can hear ya just as well from a distance, y'know~
Stop fighting and just accept it. It'll hurt less that way.
Relax. You won't be hurting anymore.
Cough… Didn't think… I'd be buried in ash myself…
You wont even realize you've been pierced, will you?
An unauthorized involvement of a third party is also prohibited.
I told you to watch yourself!
Now that's one less obstacle in our way.
You can kill me… but the Öufi will ensure that… the contract is executed to its full extent…
It is a legitimate use of force by the Öufi.
I do not have much time at this moment.
Are you hallucinating rabbits? You must be concussed.
I will take what surplus time you have.
I knew… that this day would come… I will take it slow… to my last breath…
Is something not to your liking?
If anyone even dares to lay their hands on this land, on the Mistress…
Leave now or suffer, uninvited guest.
Every uninvited thing must be removed from the premises.
Oh, I hear it. The rush of the hypogean waters… it beckons me…
No, I can't… not before I drink from the waters…
Is something not to your liking?
My deepest apologies, Lady Outis, Mistress. I have failed to complete my… duties…
Have you something to say to me?
I dedicate this blade to you.
I hope you weren't expecting to find honor in this battle.
I have struck but one of your vital points…
If I were to fall here… he would… mock me so savagely.
Ah, the mist fades… I can finally see the face of the one I so longed to see in my dreams…
This must be... your vital point!
Quit it with your idiotic bravado and take cover behind me, you fool of a Master.
Headed out for a combat reception.
Get ready to close your eyes…
Cough… I have to… protect my fool of a Master…
I'll guide you to an eternal sleep.

What the hell...
You little wild bastard...!
Yes? Is there anything I can help you with?
Apolo…gies… Master. I failed… my mission…
Give me the courage to face something…
I feel like I'm just causing you concern…
I thought… I'd be there for you all the way…
This time... I'll definitely put an end to this!

If sorrow has become my indelible stigma, then...
I choose to rise with it instead!
I'm still afraid and scared. But... I don't want to stop.
If i keep hesitating, I can't move forward.
Maybe I shouldn't have... gone down this path...
Have you aught to say about my work?
To perish in the process of artistic creation… Truly, there is no… death… more ideal…
I'm still in the conceptualization phase. Be quick about it.
A sound opinion. Let's go with that.
The rough sketch is complete. Now be quick and paint over it.
This artwork is complete. Let us critique it once we return.
They better give us a good fight.
… and share the pilfered time with everyone.
Even I end up 'redistributed'… Haah. Not bad, not bad…
Is there anything you'd like to know about the case?
We'll bring them down with our own hands!
And make this easy for all of us, okay?
Ah… so this… is how I'm silenced…
No need to be hasty in thy speech! For I have all the ti— for I have a moderate sum of time in the world.
There is aught else to collect from thee! Breathe not thy final breath!
Fie… target deceased. Collection status: inaccessible.
There is yet much time that must be collected…
Can ya speak a bit faster? You're literally wasting my time.
If you lack both the capability and the will to make your payments…
… then I have no choice but to completely drain your time.
Ha… ha… so this is how… how it ends…?
Questions must wait until this task is completed.
Let this become knowledge as well.
The moment of inevitability claims me… as well…
Please wait until this train is cleaned up. Then I'll answer your questions.
Testing gear charges. Let's clean them up in one fell swoop.
Neutralization complete. Passenger reconstruction procedure, ready to commence.
So this is how I… in this wandering path with no end in sight…
Outta my way! Let me at 'em first!
Huh, didn't think this would kill me…

Again! Again and again,
until the storm sleeps!

Tear them all to shreds!
O Dullahan!
Even if I can't lock you up...

Dullahan!
Time to ride for death.
On my own... Shall I handle it myself?

You must be feeling resentful... so wail as much as you can!
Until the sound of the storm is drowned out!
Idle chatter is ill-advised in mourning.
Go into the night without worry.
For your remembrance shall be mine as you sleep.
Could the small wings… of a butterfly have… fluttered away from this… place…?
Don't stare at these eyes for too long. I won't help you if it snares you in its trance.
Get ready to have your skull cracked open.
Isn't this a nice spread for a meal, S.H?
My sins are mine to deal with, S.F.

The eyes close shut…
and the lights… fade…
It's time! Skull face, Spider head!
Talk later, hmm? Can't be late for delivery.
Ah… I'll be… just another suitcase recovery mission, huh…
Polu, use your strength a bit! [Output increase request confirmed.]

Hah, for now, I'm falling back.
If I keep using the bag, I’ll end up dead.
Phew, at least I've got a chance.
N-no, stop! I'll get moving right now, oka- [Update. Delivery failed. The courier will be collected shortly. Thank you for your service. Poludnitsa, engaging Protection Mode.]
Potentially dangerous individual identified. Moving in to suppress.
… or your head wouldn't have been crushed by my greatsword.

Dammit, they got us…
We need to call for reinforcements…
Again. This duel is not over.
So that… wasn't enough… Perhaps this defeat could be… reviewed… in a video…
I thought I submitted everything…? What's wrong?
I'll be fine… so run… get as far away as you can from here…
I should wipe that blood off my weapon.
I'll take… one more of you with me…
Hm? Did the strap for your mask fall off?
Not even worth a patchwork. Fall apart where you stand.
A-at least let me keep the mask on…! … Then… kill me…
Can you come back later for the consultation? I'm a bit… occupied at the moment.
Are you a sinner as well?

Hnh. Finally… freed from…
the hunger…
Talking to me in the middle of a Parade isn't so polite, hm?
Your fountain of blood… How pretty.
Can we… finally come to a stop…?
Uh… did you call me? Oh, did you order something through the Devyat'?
Can you clear the way, please…?
Poludnitsa… help… [Pathfinding failed. Courier absence detected. Poludnitsa, engaging Protection Mode.]
W-wait a moment! Iet's rest for a bit.
[Low-power R&R mode activated. Energy circulation is temporarily paused. Caution. This measure is temporary. Immediate delivery is recommended.]
This shouldn't be too late, right?
[Low-power R&R mode activated. Caution. Strategic R&R Mode is only provided for the day. Please proceed with the delivery immediately.]
[Hostile forces detected. Activating Poludnitsa high-power delivery mode maneuvers.]
[Phase 1, Delivery assistant and control sequence initiated. Calmy forge a path.]
[Phase 2, delivery carrier output increased. Quick pioneering is recommended.]
[The Devyat Association's Poludnitsa discourages pointless killings. Please proceed with the delivery immediately to ensure your safety.]
[Phase 3, Warning. Time-over delivery acceleration reaching final stage. Further delays do not guarantee personal safety.]

N-no! Please, please give me another chance! I've never been late bef— [Update. Delivery failed. The courier will be collected shortly. Thank you for your service. Poludnitsa, engaging Protection Mode.]
Is this… 'the retribution' you spoke of, Priest…?

With your weapons...
I will lead this bloody battle to victory.
When it comes to making weapons, I had surpassed my father.
Focus on the feast in front of your eyes.
Priest... I leave the rest of the Family to you.
Barber... I leave the rest of the Family to you.
My only sister... I leave the rest of the Family to you.
Nervous? Take a deep, deep breath—it'll help.
You don't really know what you're doing, do you~?
Looks like I was the one who was made light of…
Take care of them. Okay, I see 'em /// Alright, Target confirmed.
Finish them off. Okay, I see 'em. /// Move aside!
This way, you can shoot, right?
… Don't try to chat me up when I'm holding my breath, yeah?
Nice, it's been a breeze so far…!
Clean shot to the head. Bullseye.
You're shittin' me… I'm not finished yet…
I'll leave it to you, Hong Lu!
… It would be deeply appreciated if the exclusion category were not to be necessitated here…
Hm. Thus I leave a recording of this weakness.
Haah… yet… there is so much of the unknown… in this world… to be learned…
Keep your distance. This flame spreads far.
This experiment… will be a failure…
Phoo… let me catch my breath.
I've cut through enough of 'em… I'll leave the rest to you…
Hah... these bastards really want to die!
My, didn't you know? You've been cut.
How are you keeping up with me this well…?
… Kuh. So this… is where the thirty-fourth Captain falls…
Go out and fight. I'll take care of the back.
Ah, be wary of the embers.
What a shame it is… that I… must depart this world… with the void of knowledge… so vast…
This conversation can wait… until the park closes.
Let's see how much more of this you can take.
I don't assume you have any last words?
Haah… don't worry. Wound's been cauterized.
Haah… isn't it too… early for me to join them…?
Any more prey I should take care of?
Mao branch of the Heishou Pack, ready to hop.
My lord, to be present here in your person is— No, my lord. Please, do speak your will.
I may die here… but… the Mao branch shall…
… Nice, now I can cross that off the book.
Heh… heh. Killing me won't clear your name off the book.
Can you please be quie— Nngh! Why the hell did you wait until now to call me up?!
Haha… I'll seeya later. The Pack… it'll come back in a stampede in no time.
Urgh... If you don't want to get caught up in it, then move!
Didya call, m'lord? Feel free to summon me for anything ya need.
Let's sink our fangs into that thing.
My, did I catch ya off guard?
What… was the point…? All that time… I wasted… for the lord…

This distance is just enough for me…
Might be a bit far for you, though!
Told you to watch yourself around a coiled-up snake.
Now, give it a real good guess. Which direction will my arm strike from?
Didn't see that coming, did you?
Haah… So death can claim me, after all.
I don’t think that’s the right direction.
Futility inheres in impossibility(不可違也). I will not be restrained.
… Please straighten my bamboo hat. Yes. That is… enough…
Please, I don't need any unnecessary fussing. I prefer the silence.
Let's take them all out. No need to waste our time here.
What a… short-lived spring this is…
Simply snuffed out like a flame.
Please, I don't need any unnecessary fussing. I prefer the silence.
Let's take them all out. No need to waste our time here.
What a… short-lived spring this is…
Simply snuffed out like a flame.
… The concept of manners must be alien to you.
Standing around as you did is what cost you your head.
I see that you are worth the cost of my ammunition.
I shall now face you with all my might.
Progressing through the mission as commanded.
… there's no need for sympathy, mutual or otherwise.
So, in this life dedicated to propriety…
I don't think I was discourteous…
Ammunition! I shall supply it for you.
Heh heh… mm. Forget you heard the laughter. What is your business here?
Thus, you sink into a bottomless slumber.
The heart that wished to die… has finally found a knife.
I shall fire and pierce you as you are.
Gasp! Doth aught requireth mine assistance?
Tis evident this foe shall pose a challenge… allow me!
Behold, for evil hath been cleansed thus!
I… swore I would… protect thee all… to the bitter…
If I am to be of any use…
Ha ha… now peace shall reign, and…?
Is it time to pay the price…?
Forgive... me... 'Twas my... failing... All of it...
Um… can we talk later? I'm feeling a bit low.
… Even you must've had someone who cared about you.
… I have a lot to protect, too.
Please… don't wake me up… I… wanna rest.
This is a warranted execution of official duties.
Hmmm, came to a full stop, did you? No matter. Your time debt's been collected.
Impossible… But… I saved up so much time… for that day… I never got… to…
To let oneself be shaken by this siltcurrent…
Never shall the green within you wake.
Reflecting back on the road that’s led me here, this is… but another path that I must take…
I command the twelve beasts, Do not let a single one who breathes before you live.
Retreat. Your life still has a use to fulfill.
Rip and tear into the enemy, show me your usefulness.
I do not allow retreat until the enemy has been slain.
I would not kneel... to this tainted blood!

No matter how tainted the blood may be,
The Lord will not die.
Until I fulfil my goal... Death... Pass by me once more!
Let us return to the task at hand(閑話休題). Obsess not over the individual; avert your focus toward the battlefield.
Swift were my hooves… They brought me to you before my time, young Miss…
A single cavalry carries the might of a thousand men…! (一騎當千).
Open wide with the heart unburdened…
… and let the gale guide your trampling.

Break through and
cast them aside!
Break through and cast them aside without limit!

Hah, it is Yi Sang.
Though my appearance is odd, I am still as I should be. It is me.
I am the guard who pursued the young Miss’s ideals alongside her, Yi Sang.

Run ahead of me. If it’s you, my lady,
then you are surely capable of doing so.

Layer upon layer of gates…
I shall break through them!
… Stop gawking around like a chicken in a battlefield. A rooster with a particularly violent streak might just peck you to death.
I wanted to see the sun rise… over this battlefield…
Spread my wings, and bore them with my talons.
Do you realize who you're talking to?
Hah… even the gaze that once embraced me… contemns me… How electrifying.
Did you think you could escape?
So it’s this one this time? Heh. I’ll cut in too.

Getting hit by your bullet like this might be its own kind of art… 
but now's not the time to leave our masterpiece unfinished.
Getting hit by your bullet like this… would be its own kind of art.
Don't get blinded by this gaze.
